title: Should semen analysis become the Pap smear for men? Some men’s health experts say yes
description: A "guy-necologist" makes a case that semen analysis should become a regular part of men's medical care.
content: A "guy-necologist" makes a case that semen analysis should become a regular part of men's medical care.
